channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Weaver Xtreme Theme Support
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Weaver Xtreme Theme Support

item.title: CVE-2023-0276|2023-04-24T18:30:53.152Z -- unknown -- weaver%20xtreme%20theme%20support
item.description: The Weaver Xtreme Theme Support WordPress plugin before 6.2.7 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-4971|2023-10-16T19:38:52.844Z -- unknown -- weaver%20xtreme%20theme%20support
item.description: The Weaver Xtreme Theme Support WordPress plugin before 6.3.1 unserialises the content of an imported file, which could lead to PHP object injections issues when a high privilege user import a malicious file and a suitable gadget chain is present on the blog.
